name: ZX Spectrum Games
overview: ZX Spectrum Games is a collection of three simplistic games. * Airport '82 sees you take on the role of a traffic controller who has to manually guide in aeroplanes onto a runway, avoiding trees and being hit by the aircraft yourself. Oh and you need to shoot the birds that are flying over the runway too... * Alien takes its inspiration from the 1979 movie of the same name and specifically the scene where Captain Dallas is moving through the air ducts with an alien in hot pursuit. Your mission is to escape the duct before the alien catches you. * Crabs is a Pac-man clone
